alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 5:19PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN SHELBY, NORTHWESTERN CHAMPAIGN, LOGAN AND SOUTH CENTRAL HARDIN COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM EDT... At 519 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near De Graff, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Bellefontaine, West Liberty, Russells Point, De Graff, Belle Center, Northwood, Quincy, Rushsylvania, Huntsville, Port Jefferson, Valley Hi, Zanesfield, New Jerusalem, Mcmorran, Maplewood, Bloom Center, Pemberton, East Liberty, Lewistown and Logansville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
